meanings.definition: Not announced or made known beforehand.
meanings.sent1: The unannounced visitor surprised us all.
meanings.sent2: The unannounced party was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent3: The unannounced snowstorm caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: Her unannounced decision to quit her job shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unannounced fireworks display lit up the night sky unexpectedly.

meanings.definition: Happening without prior warning or notification.
meanings.sent1: The unannounced test left the students anxious.
meanings.sent2: The unannounced arrival of the package was a relief.
meanings.sent3: The unannounced power outage caused chaos in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His unannounced resignation left a void in the company.
meanings.sent5: The unannounced visit from her parents brightened her day unexpectedly.
